law.text:
On the winding up and termination of a limited liability company, the assets shall be distributed as follows:
To creditors, including members who are creditors, to the extent permitted by law, in satisfaction of the liabilities of the limited liability company; and
Unless otherwise agreed, to the members in proportion to their respective capital contribution values, after the capital contribution values are adjusted by:
Adding to the members' capital contribution values their respective shares of the profits of the limited liability company; and
Deducting from the members' capital contribution values their respective shares of the losses of the limited liability company and all distributions previously received by the members.
